chattingDescription:
Whether you're new or experienced in stock control,
BoxHero is the key to simple yet efficient inventory management.
customerDesc:
More than 30,000+ teams are
already inventorying on BoxHero.
customerTitle:
All Types of Inventories
for Efficient Management are Provided
featuresTitle:
Pipeline your management
with smart features just for your team.
featuresTitleMobile:
Pipeline your management
with smart features just for your team.
keyFeature1Desc:
No more wasting your time registering items one by one.
Upload it quickly and focus on more important tasks.
keyFeature2Desc:
Increase inventory accuracy with barcode scanning.
Connect your scanner or scan from BoxHero mobile app.
keyFeature3Desc:
No more complicated analysis.
Let BoxHero do the work for you.
pageDescription: Stay on top of inventory management in real-time on your computer or mobile device.
pageTitle: BoxHero - The Simplest Inventory Management Solution
salesManagementDesc:
No more repetition.
BoxHero is all you need for managing order ➞ stock in ➞ sales ➞ stock out process seamlessly.
startNowDescription:
Try the Business Plan with your team for 30-days free trial.
Single users can use BoxHero for free.
No quotation required. BoxHero is that easy to use.
teamPlayDesc:
Easy invite, controlled team role, transparent history!
With BoxHero, teamwork is productive than ever.

transparent history!
